subject: Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Dave Whelan's soccer career ended when he was injured in the 1960 F.A. Cup final, but the club he now owns, Wigan, is headed to Wembley Stadium for the semifinals of the tournament this year.
snippet: Dave Whelan's soccer career ended when he was injured in the 1960 F.A. Cup final, but the club he now owns, Wigan, is headed to Wembley Stadium for the semifinals of the tournament this year.
